item.title: About
item.description: Andreas Siebel has been a teacher at the Christian-Wirth-Schule in Usingen since 2015. He teaches mathematics and computer science. Projekte: Miniworldmaker Kurse: Python Kurs 2019 SQL Kurs 2019 Algorithmen und OOP 2018 Python Kurs 2018

item.title: Miniworldmakerv1
item.description: The Miniworldmaker now has version 1.0! (strictly speaking already 1.0.3) That doesn’t mean that it’s bug-free (I’ve actually fixed a few minor bugs) or you won’t encounter unexpected problems - I’ll have a lot of work to do next year. But now the API looks exactly the way I want it to. Physics Objects of a class are now physically simulated if the method setup_physics() is implemented in the class.

item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: privacy statement General information This blog is hosted at Uberspace. When you visit this blog, some data is automatically transferred to the web server and stored there. This is technically necessary for the display of this website and is limited to the necessary extent. In particular, this involves the following information: the referrer URL (the website from which you came) / the IP address of the device with which you access the blog / the browser used / time and date / the operating system used.
